title: "Apple has Won 5 Design Patents presented in photo & line art forms covering the iPad Pro & Magic Keyboard Combination"
excerpt: "Patently Apple posted design patent report titled \"Apple was Granted 13 Design Patents for their 2020 iPad Air.\" Today we discovered that the Hong Kong Patent and Trademark Office has granted Apple 5 design patent totaling 38 images covering Apple's iPad Pro and Magic Keyboard combination."
